content.label:
Hands down best racer on iOS. Stunning how amazing it looks and plays on my iPX!

Every time I play it, I find myself blown away this is running on mobile. 

Well worth the price. We need more HQ games like this!

The game is good but one problem it was updated a year ago that concerns me to an extent because I want there to be more cars added and the textures to also be updated but other than that the controls are amazing and the game play is great like a console game such as Forza Horizon 4.

Is that in the game and for what graphics settings I am aware of multiplayer beta I love it but still I want this version to keep getting updates I don’t want it to die especially after paying 10$ for it

title.label: I hope the developer will take a look at it.

content.label:
First of all, it's an amazing game.The operation of the game feels very real.There is no doubt that this is the mobile game with the best picture quality.
But I hope to open a new track. Nurburgring Nordschleife，i think  its what all racing gamers are most concerned about.
In addition, I hope to be able to add keystrokes to customize the layout。
thanks for your everything

title.label: Fix Steer Lag For ALL Platforms

content.label:
This app is great. The overall gameplay is great and all of the DLCs and content keep the game interesting. The only problem is the laginess in the steering and over sensitivity that it just seems you cant get rid of. The lag mentioned here is also a problem on my Nintendo Switch. Ive been playing simulators since i was 3 years old and to see how the physics were was legit to me but im very dissatisfied that youve had this problem for actually well over a year and still havent fixed it. 

How do i know its just this game? Never bave this problem with F1 Mobile. 

Other then that, because of all the bells and whistles that come with this game 

Great Graphics
Multiple Modes
Simulation/Or arcade physics if you like.

This game is a Homerun!

Lets try open world and youll change the game.
Please add the Long Beach curcuit!!

title.label: This is what a game should be

content.label: Excellent, none of the nonsense of buying more or “earning” your way. When you only have a few minutes to play and just want to race...this is the way!!! Thank you for finally making a game again not like Real Racing or the other rip off games.
wonderful game, I loved it, but I would like them to add Formula 1 and all its tracks as well as teams, maybe also other racing categories like Rally or Formula E

Unskippable scenes. One of which was explaining to me the concept of a racing game. Automatic transmission that I haven’t figured out how to turn off yet. Was focused on trying to turn off auto breaking first. Can’t understand why a racing “sim” would have auto breaking but whatever. Turns out that increased difficulty should turn it off. Already playing at expert level so I guess that’s broken. I know it’s not an option but I’d really like my $10 back.

My iPad meets all the specs to run this game and it keeps crashing. I paid $9.99 for a game I can’t use for longer than a couple of minutes. Money isn’t that easy to come by nowadays! I definitely want a refund!
Requested a refund because I downloaded the game and it’s downloading extra packages only saying connecting to iTunes for the past 3 hours and nothing. I have a strong internet. What can I do
No reason.

Pair a recent iPad like an iPad Pro with an Xbox controller and you’ve basically got a high refresh rate console racing game. I am beyond impressed with this and i’d of happily paid more for this level of polish. Visual fidelity paired with the car mechanics and the true console feeling controls make this an absolute buy. It’s sure as hell made the Amtrak ride to and from work a lot more fun.
Game is fixed and the crashing is gone this is a very good racing game on iOS and ps3 however the only issue I have with the game itself are the controls.
This easy beats all the ‘free to play’ racing games out there. All of them. If this game was on a console, it would easily be over $30. The controller support makes the game even better.
Game crashes when trying to download dlc. Kinda wish with a 15$ game that I can at least get extra cars and maps. But other than that it has Xbox 360 and ps3 graphics. And realistic driving.

This is hands down the best driving game for iPad. There’s literally no comparison. I highly recommend using a controller as this is more like a console game than a mobile game and I couldn’t imagine trying to race without one. I wish developers would make more games like this, taking advantage of the power of the iPad and also support for controllers.

This game really may be the best racing game and one of the best games on IOS. In quarantine this is my life saver. Unlike asphalt you can't (for most circuits) you can't just hold down the throttle and have to pay 29.99 for a cool car. Also the fact that your car, the only thing that matters is tuning and your ability to drive, not your ability to spend money. There are little things that you can do that give you an advantage. My ONLY thing that I disagree with is not having the reverse time things in harder difficulties. I know it balances the game and XP but I simply need to be a better driver to do that, and it's a large margin. Other than that I love what you guys did with the game and I hope you can add tutorials for some things like drifting. The gyroscope unlike most games I have never had to worry about, it's like seamless and I don't know how you guys did that but there has never been a problem with it. Can I ask what you guys did to do that because I really am iove with that.

title.label: Best racing game on mobile. Period.

content.label: Love the game. Was just wondering if it would be possible to run the better graphics at 60fps on newer iPhones (personally have an iPhone XR) and do you plan to include multiplayer?
Did i said “ WOW!!!”
I have the game on Xbox 360 and I feel like it a helluva lot easier on here than it is on there

I had an IPhone X that ran this game great with a controller. Absolutely no issues. When I got the new iPhone 11 Pro the game has started to lag, gitter, audio cuts out every couple seconds and also causes the steering to lock and not move for about half a second. Not much but enough to throw you off the track and ruin your race. It is unplayable and I’m very disappointed as this definitely should be a 5 star game.

title.label: Awesome game but could you add more?

content.label: I like destruction so I always crash my vehicle into other vehicles but I always get knocked out. Could you plz add a game mode where other players take damage and you don’t. Thx.
Is there multiplayer in this game. If so can I play with my friends. Btw great game

I’ve never written a review for anything in my life. But this game is absolutely 100% the best racing game you can get for IOS. I have my settings to simulator (assists slow you down) so it definitely takes a bit of practice to get used to and I’ve crashed out of my share of races but wow. the AI is very intelligent, very quick on the higher settings, graphics are absolutely incredible especially for a mobile game. Ive had it for over a year and the game has crashed one maaaaybe two times. Feral and codemasters did an amazing job here. The only suggestion i have is to allow players to choose their number and maybe put some helmet options. other than that, if you’re looking for a racing game for your phone this is definitely without a doubt the game to pick.

title.label: The BEST Racing Sim on Mobile

content.label:
If you’re a Forza or GT fan you will not be disappointed by GRID. I started out with the tilt controls initially and it was ok. However, in the drifting events I found it frustratingly unplayable. 

All of this went away once I paired an XBOX controller. With a proper controller and all assists turned off, the game went from being simply ok to absolutely sublime. Graphics, audio, physics and just overall car-feel are all top notch. 

Well done Codemasters.

Note: You must have a Bluetooth compatible controller. Not all XBOX controllers are.
...my money back!
Proper “PC-class” game. Worth every dollar. The only thing that I am missing is support for bluetooth controllers.
Wish I could get a refund this game is ok but I really don’t like the controls on this thing

The full unlocked performance isn’t available on the 2020 iPad Pro. 

Also... open wheel cars have no drivers in the cars... make them look like toys...

The phone I use is the iPhone XR. Like the new phone, it does not have 3D touch. Therefore, the throttle and brake in the game become difficult to control. I hope you can add a linear throttle or brake operation to ensure the xr game experience. Thank you very much, this is my favorite game, but without 3d touch I can no longer play this game

title.label: The best game ive ever played

content.label:
Why dont you take grid 2 to ios too
And give more updates and changes for battery saving this game drained up my battery 
The best racing game ever it has ps4 graphic really 
NEW UPDATE NEEDED.
So I love the game. It’s fun and realistic but it crashes so frequently. It’s the only bad point

I just bought this, love everything so far but one issue I have. I play on the iPad 10.5 and I have a lot of screen real estate to play with so is it possible you can add an option to adjust the button controls on the screen how you like? In other words, I would want to place the buttons at places I feel comfortable with and also be able to change the touch response sensitivity also. 

Thanks loads!

Thank you for the pay-once-and-play concept that most developers have completely abandoned. If you have a quality product you should be able to have the confidence to charge a fair price and let the game speak for itself. This one certainly does.

The car physics are pretty good for a mobile game and the graphics on my 12.9” gen 2 iPad Pro are frankly incredible. Not sure how real world the individual car handling is but if it’s accurate, wow, the McLaren P1 is truly horrible. It’s loose under throttle. It’s loose under braking. It’s loose coasting. The thing just can’t go around corners. What lunatic would drop a cool million on such garbage?!
Just restart your phone. 100% works
There’s a bit of a learning curve, but hang in there. It’s the best racing game on IOS, particularly if you have a decent bluetooth controller. The physics are amazing.
Great game! Console quality! No IAP, no subscription, no problems. Works with controller (I use and Xbox controller with Bluetooth). Nice game!

title.label: 额外内容下载太慢，为什么不直接一次性安装到位？

content.label: 高清材质包下载了两天都没下载成功，不知道是不是我的网络问题。我用4g和无线网都尝试了，下载的速度一直是上个世纪的网速！

name.label: in need of a easy driving game

content.label: Way to hard to drive even in easy mode. Impossible steering even with trying to adjust in the app controls. Makes me never want to drive a fast car if this game is even close to reality. Pass this one unless you are a masochist.
It is the best racing game on moblie
I can not rate the game due to the fact that it crashes upon launching. What a waste of $10.

The best racing game I have found for the iPad. If your into sim racing you’ll love this for on the go, especially with a controller. Physics are simcade, not quite arcade but not quite simulation. Simulation physics are terrible for a controller, I’m glad there’s a balance here for this game. People are complaining that it’s hard to control, it’s not need for speed.

EDIT: It seems that there is only one instance of the controller issue. Randomly lost controller support and my mapped buttons. I rebooted the device and the controller was still not working. 

24 hours later, controller is working again. Weird? (Lost binding)

PS4 controller, latest iPad OS, IPad Pro 12.9”

Really want to know if you are planning a graphical and performance update for iPhone 11 Pro as the CPU gets more powerful and we really want 60fps on the highest graphics settings! Don’t want to settle on performance mode with lost visual quality just for 60fps!!

Otherwise really loving the game.

Ya know I just bought this game a few months ago and I’m pretty impressed. This is the first time I’ve seen game almost competing up to Forza motorsport. I mean, yes, people are saying that the steering seems a bit off and I had that problem turned a setting on and it was pretty normal from there. I like how there going for a more “Simulation style than other racing games” and I really like that. It brings out the heart of racing. I mean there’s a few bugs here and there but you gotta expect that it’s a game there’s always gonna be bugs. Overall it’s a great game and if you looking to buy then you should it will impress you if your looking for a good racing game that’s console quality. But if your looking for something easier then you should look for something else thank you for reading and have fun racing!

I was looking on the App Store for racing games and saw this and it seemed fun and legit. But then when I looked at the price it said $9.99 but when I paid it, it charger me $29.96. Which is a large jump in price then it was advertised.
Tiene 10 meses sin actualizar. El qué no corre, se queda atrás.

This game does cost money upfront but is worth it in the long run since there aren’t in app purchases. For a long time I was a fan of real racing 3, but this is is so much better. It really is counsel quality, (similar quality to forza).

Playing this game is to me even better than playing on console. The creators did everything right. The graphics, the real tracks that I have raced on other Grid games. I have found no flaw. The only thing that I want these guys to do is make a Dirt game. If they made a Dirt game for a similar price I can almost assure you that it would be a hit. I personally use an X-box one s remote to play this so I do not have the trouble in the controls that others may have so to those out there that are having trouble and have a blue tooth controller at all I would recommend trying that. All in all I would gladly pay dabble for this game and I have for much worse. Keep up the amazing work, and I am looking forward to more games from you.👍
This is the best console quality racing game you can get on iOS and an example on how others should be ported as well. I would gladly pay money for quality games such as this
